summary: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
cast: Jay Baruchel|Gerard Butler|Craig Ferguson|America Ferrera|Jonah Hill|Christopher Mintz-Plasse|T.J. Miller|Kristen Wiig|Robin Atkin Downes|Philip McGrade|Kieron Elliott|Ashley Jensen|David Tennant
title: Cómo entrenar a tu dragón
